permissions: Available to all users (including anonymous); policy scope resolves all records for anonymous and non-admin users.
validation_notes: Filters are optional. filter[name] performs a partial, case-insensitive match; filter[can-apply-to] filters by entity type.

flags.name: --can-apply-to
flags.validation: Must be a valid entity type. Allowed values: Broker, BrokerInvoice, Customer, CustomerCommitment, CustomerTender, Developer, Equipment, Job, JobProductionPlan, JobProductionPlanMaterialType, JobSite, Laborer, MaterialPurchaseOrder, MaterialPurchaseOrderRelease, MaterialSite, MaterialSupplier, MaterialType, Project, ProjectCostClassification, ProjectRevenueClassification, ProjectRevenueItem, ProjectTransportLocation, ProjectTransportOrganization, ProjectTransportPlanEvent, ProjectTransportPlanSegment, ProjectTransportPlanSegmentSet, TradingPartner, TransportOrder, TransportOrderStop, Trucker, TruckerInvoice.
